column1: MRI image size (128, 256, 1) of the head of a man of 37 years old in weighting T2, of sagittal section. We observe slice n°120 starting from the right hemisphere of the skull. The following elements are present : the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 2739.5508 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 6746.0449 mm³, the left lateral ventricle of volume 395.5078 mm³, the white matter of left hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 284.7656 mm³, the left cerebellar cortex of volume 1720.4590 mm³, the left thalamus of volume 411.3281 mm³, the left caudate nucleus of volume 6.5918 mm³, the fourth ventricle of volume 2.6367 mm³, the brainstem of volume 1077.0996 mm³, the cerebrospinal fluid of volume 2.6367 mm³, the left nucleus accumbens of volume 22.4121 mm³ and the left ventral diencephalon of volume 266.3086 mm³.
